LanguageData.Bogleg_FatHediff.label: stored blubber
LanguageData.Bogleg_FatHediff.description: This pawn has large fat stores capable of accumulating usable fat for dealing with starvation.
LanguageData.DV_KnuckleDusters.label: knuckle dusters
LanguageData.DV_KnuckleDusters.description: A pair of metal knuckle dusters. They concentrate the force of a punch into a smaller area, which results in more damage.
LanguageData.DV_KnuckleDusters.comps.0.tools.0.label: knuckles
